sentences.en: "Fourteen minutes," Chris said, taking a peep at his watch.
sentences.cn: “14分钟,”克里斯瞥了一眼他的手表说道.

sentences.en: After all, 15 minutes of exercise is better than nothing.
sentences.cn: 毕竟，锻炼15分钟比不锻炼好。

sentences.en: Both horse and rider were dripping with sweat within five minutes.
sentences.cn: 没过五分钟，马和骑手都大汗淋漓。

sentences.en: Bye Mom, see you in a minute.
Fischer won after 5 hours and 41 minutes of play.
sentences.cn: 经过5小时41分钟的较量，菲舍尔获得了胜利。

sentences.en: For a few minutes she sat on her bed watching the clock.
sentences.cn: 她坐在床上盯着时钟看了几分钟。

sentences.en: He looked a forlorn figure as he limped off after 26 minutes.
sentences.cn: 26分钟之后他一瘸一拐地走出来，显得孤单凄凉。

sentences.en: He'd been reading the minutes of the last meeting.
sentences.cn: 他一直在看上次会议的记录。

sentences.en: I've got to rush. Got a meeting in a few minutes.
sentences.cn: 我得赶紧走了。几分钟后要开个会。

sentences.en: She embroidered on this theme for about ten minutes.
sentences.cn: 她围绕这个主题添枝加叶地说了大约10分钟。

sentences.en: She recorded a time of two minutes 8.74 seconds.
sentences.cn: 她以两分8秒74的成绩创了纪录。

sentences.en: The pizza will then take about twenty minutes to cook.
sentences.cn: 接下来，比萨饼大约要用20分钟烤好。

sentences.en: The President had his plane waiting, 20 minutes' drive away.
sentences.cn: 总统让飞机在20分钟车程的地方等着。

sentences.en: The remand hearing is often over in three minutes.
sentences.cn: 取保候审听证会通常在3分钟内结束。

sentences.en: The video was seven minutes of high camp and melodrama.
sentences.cn: 那段录像里是7分钟极尽夸张搞笑的闹剧表演。

sentences.en: They sat talking and necking in the car for another ten minutes.
sentences.cn: 他们在车里又坐了10分钟，边说边搂着亲热。

sentences.en: Vacuum-packed ham slices should be unwrapped 30 minutes before serving.
sentences.cn: 真空包装的火腿片应在食用前30分钟把包装除去。

sentences.en: Water can be purified by boiling for five minutes.
sentences.cn: 水煮沸5分钟便可得到净化。

words.tran_cn: 分钟（minute的复数）；会议记录；备忘录

trans.tran_cn: [法] 备忘录，会议记录，审判记录，分( minute的名词复数 )，分钟，瞬间，片刻
trans.tran_en: A minute is one of the sixty parts that an hour is divided into. People often say "a minute" or "minutes" when they mean a short length of time.

trans.tran_cn: 把…记录在案；为…测定时间（minute的单三形式）
